resources.string: Here is the list contains the information of Sports places in Oulu, provided by University of Jyv채skyl채 (https://www.lipas.fi/) open data
Here is the list contains the information of Oulu City Properties Basic information, provided by Oulu open data(https://www.ouka.fi/avoindata)
Here is the list contains the information of Oulu city Symphony Orchestra, provided by Oulu open data(https://www.ouka.fi/avoindata)
Here is the list contains the information of Oulu city council meeting, provided by Oulu open data(https://www.ouka.fi/avoindata)

This application is for the course \"T742803 Mobile Data Communications\" during the summer, 2019 which that uses some telecommunication standard for the communication outside the phone (In this application case, communication with Open data API from University of Jyv채skyl채 and Oulu City) From This application, User can find information about open data about Oulu city (Oulu council meeting information, Basic information of Oulu city properties, Information of Oulu Symphony Orchestra and Oulu Sports place(public/private).
